fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 rose 92.90 points or 0.47% to settle at 19,819.95. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 0.85% to 10.78. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The September 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 28 September 2023.
